description: Absorb a block as a brush into your brush inventory
absorb.name: Absorb

description: Add a spell to a player or wand
add_spell.name: Add Spell

description: Force a mob to focus on the caster
aggro.name: Aggro

description: Increase an entity's air supply
air_supply.name: Air Supply

description: Target all entities in the current world, or optionally in all worlds
all_entities.name: All Entities

description: Experimental incomplete action, do not use.
animate.name: Animate

description: Apply or clear cooldowns on one or more of a player's spells
apply_cooldown.name: Apply Cooldown

description: Target all entities within a radius
area_of_effect.name: Area Of Effect

description: Create an area of effect cloud entity. Shortcut for the SpawnEntity action.
area_of_effect_cloud.name: Area Of Effect Cloud

description: Create a projectile that uses an armor stand.
This can be used with invisible armor stands holding items from a custom resource pack for detailed custom 3D projectiles.
armor_stand_projectile.name: Armor Stand Projectile

description: Move up through blocks above the player
ascend.name: Ascend

description: Performs its sub-actions outside of the flow of the rest of the action list
This can be used to launch several projectiles without waiting for them to hit, for instance.
asynchronous.name: Asynchronous

description: Looks in a specific direction for blocks matching the destructible list
block_search.name: Block Search

description: Grows a blockk as if bonemeal had been used on it
bonemeal.name: Bonemeal

description: Modify a book-based wand, used for creating dynamic books
Can also give a book
book.name: Book

description: Breaks a block naturally
Can be configured to only break blocks below a certain vanilla durability
Applies packet-based block breaking effects before fully destroying a block
If the player does not have break permission, the visual breaking effects will still be applied but the block will not fully break
break_block.name: Break Block

description: Change the brush used for contained actions
Capable of choosing a random brush from a 'brushes' proability map
brush.name: Brush

description: Open the brush selector GUI
brush_select.name: Brush Select

description: Light the target block on fire
burn.name: Burn

description: Cancel any active spells, or specific spells, for the target player
cancel.name: Cancel

description: Remove the target entity and replace it with a spawn egg that will respawn the entity
capture.name: Capture

description: Cast a specific spell, optionally providing parameters
This can be used to make complex combinations of spells, or a spell that randomly casts other spells
It could also be used as a way to organize commonly-used sets of actions and use them in several different spells.
cast.name: Cast

description: An action used for debugging specific cast results
cast_result.name: Cast Result

description: Change the biome of the target block
change_biome.name: Change Biome

description: A complicated compound action that can be used to run sub-actions using a modified context
The action context includes things such as the source and target locations and entities
change_context.name: Change Context

description: Change the parameters of a spell mid-cast
change_parameters.name: Change Parameters

description: Move a player to another server
Requires a BungeCord server network
change_server.name: Change Server

description: Move the player to a different world, but with the same coordinate as in their current world
Can be configured with a set of worlds and scales, for instance to mimic nether:overworld 1:8 scale
change_world.name: Change World

description: Force the target player to say something in chat
chat.name: Chat

description: Test if a block is in the destructible list
Only runs its sub-actions if the block passes the destructible check.
check_block.name: Check Block

description: Test if an entity is allowed to target
Only runs its sub-actions if the entity passes the checks.
check_entity.name: Check Entity

description: Check the target entity's health
Will either stop the spell or run a set of actions, depending on the health of the target
check_health.name: Check Health

description: Check the players inventory for a specific item
Will run sub-actions if the item is found
If no sub-actions are given, will cancel the spell if the item is not found
check_inventory.name: Check Inventory

description: Test if a player has or does not have an amount of mana
Only runs its sub-actions if player's mana is as required.
check_mana.name: Check Mana

description: Runs a set of actions only if the caster meets certain requirements
Some requirement types expect a single value, others expect a section containing one or more of: min, max, value. These requirements can be a range or require a specific value to be set.
permission: Check a permission
path: The player must have reached a progression path
path_exact: The player must current be on a progression path
path_end: The player must be ready to advance from a path
wand: The player must be holding a specific wand
holding_wand: The player must be holding any wand (true/false)
class: The player must have unlocked a specific mage class
wand_tags: The player must be holding a wand with specific tags
wands: The player must be holding one of a set of wands
wand_properties: The player's wand must have properties within a specific range (ranged)
class_properties: The player's mage class must have properties within a specific range (ranged)
attributes: The player must have some attributes within a specific range (ranged)
time: Only during a certain time of day (ranged)
light: Only at certain light levels (ranged)
check_requirements.name: Check Requirements

description: Clear the target player's chat log
This is done by sending 100 blank lines
clear_chat.name: Clear Chat

description: Run one or more commands

Support the following variables: @spell, @pd (caster display name), @p, @pn (same as @p, caster name), @uuid, @world, @x, @y, @z, @tworld, @tx, @ty, @tz (target location), @td (target display name), @t, @tn (same as @t, target name), @tuuid
command.name: Command

description: Target all entities within a cone in front of the caster
cone_of_effect.name: Cone Of Effect

description: Count up the number of blocks or entities targeted and message the count to the caster
count.name: Count

description: Target the first solid block below the current target
cover.name: Cover

description: Create a PreciousStones field
create_field.name: Create Field

description: Create a Towny plot
create_plot.name: Create Plot

description: A flexible custom projectile
This projectile can be made to reflect off surfaces, hit multiple entities or blocks, run spell actions as it travels, and more.
It is able to mimic a gravity-bound projectile, home in on a target, and perform staged animations
This is the base class for AmorStandProjectile and EntityProjectile
custom_projectile.name: Custom Projectile

description: Change blocks to other blocks using a mapping list
cycle_block.name: Cycle Block

description: Change entities to other entity types using a mapping list
cycle_entity.name: Cycle Entity

description: Target all blocks in a cylinder
cylinder.name: Cylinder

description: Damage the target entity
damage.name: Damage

description: Deactivate active spells for the target
deactivate.name: Deactivate

description: Turn on the spell debugger
debugger.name: Debugger

description: Don't proceed to the next action until some amount of time has passed
Can be used at the beginning of a spell for a 'warmup' period, and will advertise the warmup in spell lore if the warmup parameter is used.
delay.name: Delay

description: Move down through the blocks underneath the caster
descend.name: Descend

description: Temporarily disable block physics updates
disable_physics.name: Disable Physics

description: Remove the item the target is holding
For target players will optionally move the item into their inventory instead of throwing it on the ground.
disarm.name: Disarm

description: Target all blocks within a 2D circular disc
disc.name: Disc

description: Apply a disguise to an entity
Requires the ProtocolLib and LibsDisguises plugins
disguise.name: Disguise

description: Open or close a door
door.name: Door

description: Destroy blocks and drop items as if they were broken naturally
drop.name: Drop

description: Drop an item on the ground
drop_item.name: Drop Item

description: Cause a target creeper to be electrified
electrify.name: Electrify

description: Randomly upgrade a wand, as if enchanted via the old enchanting system
Will add spells and other properties to a wand randomly, as determined by its current path configuration
enchant_wand.name: Enchant Wand

description: A CustomProjectile with an entity attached
Ever want to attack someone using a flying llama?
entity_projectile.name: Entity Projectile

description: Show a GUI allowing the player to select nearby entities to target
Will run its sub-actions with the selected entity as the target
entity_select.name: Entity Select

description: Create a vanilla explosion
Due to the exponential fall-off used by vanilla Minecraft for calculating explosion damage to entities, use of this action is discouraged.
Explosions can be easily gamed by wise players in PvP situations once they learn the exact distance to cast from to get the center on top of the target entity.
explosion.name: Explosion

description: Apply protection from falling to a target entity for a period of time.
fall_protection.name: Fall Protection

description: Fill the target's hunger bars
feed.name: Feed

description: Fills a wand with all available spells
fill_wand.name: Fill Wand

description: Launch a vanilla firework
Can work like a projectile, running actions when the firework explodes.
firework.name: Firework

description: Grow flowers
Can randomly select flowers from a probability map
flower.name: Flower

description: Put the target player into creative mode fly
fly.name: Fly

description: Freeze a block
Turns air blocks into snow, increases height of snow blocks, turns water into ice and lava into stone, and puts out fires.
freeze.name: Freeze

description: Give an item directly to a player
give_item.name: Give Item

description: Force a player to glide
Does not necessarily require that the player is wearing an elytra
glide.name: Glide

description: Turn baby entities into adults, zombies into giants, and optionally skeletons into wither skeletons
grow_entity.name: Grow Entity

description: Restore an entity's health.
Can restore a specific amount of health, or a percentage of max health
heal.name: Heal

description: Light an entity on fire, or put out a fire
ignite.name: Ignite

description: Show a player a specific inventory
Can be used to view the player's ender chest, show them a disposable chest inventory, or the inventory of the target container
inventory.name: Inventory

description: Close the target player's inventory
inventory_close.name: Inventory Close

description: Create a GUI shop that can sell vanilla or magic items
The shop is also capable of casting spells on players
item_shop.name: Item Shop

description: Kill the target entity
Deals 100 x the entity's max health in damage, just to be safe.
kill.name: Kill

description: Create a dynamic ledger from a book wand, which will show a player's balances
ledger.name: Ledger

description: Modify the light level of the target block
Requires the LightAPI plugin
Do to issues with LightAPI, lighting changes do not reliably undo!
light.name: Light

description: Strike lighting at the target
Can spawn a fully active lightning bolt, or just the visual effect
lightning.name: Lightning

description: Target all blocks along a single line
line.name: Line

description: Apply a vanilla lock to a container
Will give the caster a key item they may use to unlock the container
The key and lock will use the caster's UUID, the item name is obfuscated with the enchantment text decoration
Can also be used to unlock a container
lock.name: Lock

description: Lower a block so that it is within a certain distance of its lowest neighbor
lower_block.name: Lower Block

description: Send a chat, action bar or title message to the target player or caster
message.name: Message

description: Modify a block by changing its type
Can also be used to spawn falling blocks in the place of a block that was removed
Falling blocks can be given velocity for explosion type block effects
modify_block.name: Modify Block

description: Tag a block as breakable so that other spells can break the block
modify_breakable.name: Modify Breakable

description: Change the player's game mode
modify_game_mode.name: Modify Game Mode

description: Modifies the lore of a vanilla item
Can be used to add, subtract or otherwise modify numeric values in lore using regex
modify_lore.name: Modify Lore

description: Can be used to lock, unlock or activate a player's mage classes
modify_mage.name: Modify Mage

description: Add or remove mana from a player or wand
modify_mana.name: Modify Mana

description: Modify the maximum health of the target entity.
This change is permanent!
modify_max_health.name: Modify Max Health

description: Modify the base parameters of the spell mid-cast
modify_parameters.name: Modify Parameters

description: Modify the properties of a player or wand
modify_properties.name: Modify Properties

description: Change a block so that it will reflect spells
modify_reflective.name: Modify Reflective

description: Add or remove Spell Points
modify_s_p.name: Modify SP

description: Set or change a variable that can be used elsewhere in this spell
modify_variable.name: Modify Variable

description: Modify the walk speed attribute of the target
modify_walk_speed.name: Modify Walk Speed

description: Force the caster to mount the target entity
mount.name: Mount

description: Mount an armor stand, optionally creating and removing the armor stand
This is the action that powers broomsticks and other vehicles
Using custom resource pack models, this can be used to implement driveable cars, planes or just about anything by applying velocity to the armor stand when mounted
It has many parameters for handling crashing, hovering, and other options
mount_armor_stand.name: Mount Armor Stand

description: Move a block from one location to another
move_block.name: Move Block

description: Repeat a set of actions mulitple times in parallel
Will fall back to using the 'repeat' parameter if 'multiply' is not specified
multiply.name: Multiply

description: Force the target entity to face a specific direction
orient.name: Orient

description: Runs each action in the list of sub-actions in parallel, rather than sequentially
parallel.name: Parallel

description: Target all blocks in a 2D plane
plane.name: Plane

description: Play a specific set of effects from the spell's effects list
play_effects.name: Play Effects

description: Play music from a vanilla record disc to the target player
play_record.name: Play Record

description: Play a sound to the target player
Can be used with vanilla sounds or custom sounds from a resource pack
play_sound.name: Play Sound

description: Show the caster a GUI with heads for all players on the server, allowing them to choose a player who will be the target of the sub-action list
player_select.name: Player Select

description: Apply or remove vanilla potion effects from the target
potion_effect.name: Potion Effect

description: Change the state of redstone blocks such as levers and buttons
power_block.name: Power Block

description: Execute or skip sub-actions based on a random chance
probability.name: Probability

description: Launch a vanilla projectile
projectile.name: Projectile

description: Raise a block up so that it is near its highest neighbor
raise_block.name: Raise Block

description: Randomly choose one from the set of sub-actions to execute
random.name: Random

description: Show a customizeable GUI of warps and other locations
Can be used with warps created by Essentials or CommandBook
recall.name: Recall

description: Recursively follows blocks that match the spell's destructible list
Can be configured to only follow a specific list of block faces, such as only filling downward
recurse.name: Recurse

description: Remove an entity from the world completely, without killing it or having it drop loot
remove_entity.name: Remove Entity

description: Repair the target item, or items in the target player's inventory
repair_item.name: Repair Item

description: Repeat sub-actions a number of times in sequence
repeat.name: Repeat

description: Performs targeting as normal, passing the new target to its sub-actions
retarget.name: Retarget

description: Mount and control the target entity
This is the base action for MountArmorStand
ride_entity.name: Ride Entity

description: Target all blocks in a ring
ring.name: Ring

description: Show the caster a customizeable GUI
This gui can be used to sell items, or cast spells
This is similar to ItemShop but more customizeable, allowing for requirements for each item, different costs or a mix of items and spells.
See: the Selector wiki section for more info!
selector.name: Selector

description: Group a set of actions together and run them in serial
This is mainly useful inside of actions like Random or Parallel, to group a set of actions together as a single option for the parent action.
serial.name: Serial

description: A flexible shop GUI, based on Selector, for selling items, spells, wand or just about anything else.
See: the Shops wiki section for more info!
shop.name: Shop

description: Remove a block and replace it with a skull item representation of the block
Only works on a very limited set of blocks, the ones for which Mojang has provided MHF skins.
shrink_block.name: Shrink Block

description: Change entities to baby entities
can apply damage to entities and drop skulls for them when killed
shrink_entity.name: Shrink Entity

description: This action is not complete, do not use. It is intended to replace SimulateSpell
Runs a simulation of Conway's game of life
The simulation can have custom rules, and can be run in 2D or 3D
simulate.name: Simulate

description: Show the skill selection GUI to the caster
This is the same GUI that a player would get if using the /mskills command
skill_selector.name: Skill Selector

description: Runs its sub actions every N iterations, skipping them the rest of the time
This is most often used to slow down a spell in chunks, by skipping a Delay sub-action
This can be used for block animations to allow ModifyBlock to run N times per tick with a delay in between
skip.name: Skip

description: Spawn a new entity in the world
Can be used with a magic mob, a full custom mob config, a simple vanilla mob or a random probability table of mobs
spawn_entity.name: Spawn Entity

description: Show the caster the spell progress GUI, which will show them spells they have that are upgradeable, and the requirements to upgrade them.
spell_progress.name: Spell Progress

description: A spell-specific variant of ItemShop
Can be used to spell a specific set of spells, cast spells on the buyer, or automatically show players the spells available to them at their current path.
This is the main method of progression for players that is available via the enchantment table GUI
spell_shop.name: Spell Shop

description: Target all blocks in a sphere
sphere.name: Sphere

description: Randomly modify the target location or source direction
spread.name: Spread

description: Temporarily remove the player's wand and return it on undo
stash_wand.name: Stash Wand

description: Stop running the spell and finish it immediately
stop.name: Stop

description: Apply super protection to a player, as if they were holding a wand with the 'protected' property
A super protected player can't be damaged in any way or targeted by any spells
super_protection.name: Super Protection

description: Spawn a primed TNT entity
Can run a set of actions when the TNT detonates
t_n_t.name: TNT

description: Remove some costs from the caster, failing if they do not have enough
take_costs.name: Take Costs

description: Remove items from the player's inventory
take_item.name: Take Item

description: Tame the target entity and set its owner as the caster
tame.name: Tame

description: Teleport the caster to the target location
teleport.name: Teleport

description: Throw a falling block entity
Can run a set of actions when the block lands
throw_block.name: Throw Block

description: Throw an item
Can run a set of actions when the item despawns
throw_item.name: Throw Item

description: Target all loaded tile entities
tile_entities.name: Tile Entities

description: Change the time of the target world
Can also change the phase of the moon
time.name: Time

description: Attach a torch to the target block
torch.name: Torch

description: Grow a tree at the target location
This uses the vanilla tree generation algorithm and is not undoable
Can be made to choose the type of tree based on the biome of the target block
tree.name: Tree

description: Undoes spells
Can undo the last spell cast by the caster, the last spell cast by the target, or the last spell to have affected the target block.
May require that the spell was cast recently or was cast by the caster of the undoing spell.
Can also be used to undo changes performed in the current spell, including only undoing a limit set of changes in FIFO order. This can be used to create complex animations within a single spell.
undo.name: Undo

description: Check the current path for upgrades or process property upgrades by some number of levels
upgrade_path.name: Upgrade Path

description: Vanish the target player, making them completely invisible to other players
vanish.name: Vanish

description: Apply velocity to the target entity
Can be used to push or pull the entity away or towards the caster
Can modify the velicity applied based on the target's distance from the ground, for a spell that applies a higher speed when up in the air
velocity.name: Velocity

description: Target all blocks within a cuboid volume
volume.name: Volume

description: Force the target to wear a specific block or item on their head
Can also be used to force the caster to wear the target block
wear.name: Wear

description: Change the weather in the target world
weather.name: Weather

description: An animated swirl that follows the shape of a sphere
animated_ball.name: Animated Ball

description: An arc that extends from the source location to the target location
arc.name: Arc

description: A model of an atom with a nuclues and one or more orbitals
atom.name: Atom

description: A big explosion with loud sounds
big_bang.name: Big Bang

description: Make it look like a player is bleeding, an optionally apply the hurt effect
bleed.name: Bleed

description: A 2D circle
circle.name: Circle

description: A puffy cloud
cloud.name: Cloud

description: Draw an image or animated gif using redstone or other colored particles
colored_image.name: Colored Image

description: A swirly cone extending out from the source location
cone.name: Cone

description: A wireframe cube
cube.name: Cube

description: A cylinder that may be hollow or solid
cylinder.name: Cylinder

description: A shiny disco ball in the sky
disco_ball.name: Disco Ball

description: Extends a strand of DNA with helixes rotating around a base
dna.name: Dna

description: A torus shape
donut.name: Donut

description: Strands of fire that shoot out in arcs
dragon.name: Dragon

description: A sphere that resembles the earth
earth.name: Earth

description: Uses equations to render a particle each tick.
Is capable of parametric equations, rendering multiple particles per tick.
Equations use a 't' variable by default to represent the current tick, this variable starts at zero and counts up.
equation.name: Equation

description: A large explosion
explode.name: Explode

description: Make something look like it's on fire
flame.name: Flame

description: A fountain of particles shooting up in the sky
fountain.name: Fountain

description: Create a 2D wireframe grid
grid.name: Grid

description: Creates a 2D heart in 3D space
heart.name: Heart

description: A flat spiralling helix
helix.name: Helix

description: Waving hills
hill.name: Hill

description: A single particle appears above the target
icon.name: Icon

description: Render a monochrome image from an image file or animated gif.
Black pixels will be skipped, all other pixels display as the selected particle type
image.name: Image

description: Apply velocity to the target entity
jump.name: Jump

description: Extend a line from the source to the target
line.name: Line

description: Make hearts bubble out of the target
love.name: Love

description: Modify any other effect using equations
Equations can be applied to any parameter of the contained effect.
Equations can also be used to move the entire effect around.
modified.name: Modified

description: A ring of musical notes
music.name: Music

description: Create a simple graph of an equation using separate x and y equations.
This is primarily intended for testing equations, and not really meant to be used for in-game effects
plot.name: Plot

description: Creat a dome around the target
shield.name: Shield

description: Send the target entity flying into the sky
sky_rocket.name: Sky Rocket

description: Make it appear as though the target is smoldering
smoke.name: Smoke

description: Create a 3D sphere
sphere.name: Sphere

description: Create a 2D star
star.name: Star

description: Render text in the air using particles
text.name: Text

description: A swirling tornado of particles
tornado.name: Tornado

description: Trail particles behind the target entity
trace.name: Trace

description: Make the target entity change directions
turn.name: Turn

description: Create a swirling vortex
vortex.name: Vortex

description: Rings that descend around the target, as if they had stepped on a teleporter pad
warp.name: Warp

description: Create a wavy horizontal plane
wave.name: Wave
